Here's AI to Take on Fake News

Alec AI Assist is a Machine Learning Chatbot that helps you fight against Fake News.Alec AI Assist is an initiative by InTru Innovations all curated in the fight against cyber threats and make a safe digital space by its developer Ayush Anand.


Please Note that this is in development mode, we don't yet support Fake News Classification via our Chatbot due to Billing Issues with the GOOGLE Infrastructure.
We strongly believe that we will find a way with it latest by October 30th, 2019.
We hope that if anyone of you wants to help us in this not-for-profit project by getting us rid of the billing issue (existing GCP or Azure or AWS users might be familiar with this term) then they are most welcome. Since I am a student in Class 11 in India and I have been awarded USD 2400 for the Launch of my Action on Google Assistant.
To contact me you can fill this short form at https://ayushanand18.github.io/contact.html
